page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Many inhabitants of Cotherstone village are commuters to Teesside, Darlington and Barnard Castle where they are engaged as solicitors, accountants bankers, teachers and shop assistants; but the main employer is Glaxo Operations (UK) Ltd a pharmaceutical firm in Barnard Castle. The surrounding scattered farms are still worked by traditional and single families, from one generation to another. {Clubs} There is a good community spirit within the village and the Village Hall is used as a meeting place for many groups of people, eg Women's Institute, Youth Club, Over 60's Club, British Legion, Cancer Research, Local Historical Society, Badminton. A Fun Weekend is held annually to raise money for various charities and good causes.
